org.horrabin.horrorss
Class RssSyndicationModuleBean

java.lang.Object
  org.horrabin.horrorss.RssSyndicationModuleBean

public class RssSyndicationModuleBean
extends java.lang.Object

The RssSyndicationModuleBean object represents the Syndication module of an RSS feed. Valid for RDF specification.

Author:
Fernando Fornieles
